title: A Host Avails Little (1U251)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Search. Maneuver: Spot a [Sauron] Orc and 6 companions to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Do this once for each companion over 5.
Lore:	”'Had I a host of Elves in armour of the Elder Days, it would avail little….'”
Rarity:	U
Notes:	If you can spot 7 or more companions, you may wound the same companion more than once.
